title: Join the Arbiters and League Volunteers on Discord
body:
Link update: https://discord.gg/HA2ShHw

> #You are cordially invited to the League of Legends Community Chat Discord!

This server is managed by members of the official League Volunteer programs from the NA, EU, and OCE regions (but is not an official Riot Discord). It accommodates hundreds of concurrent players from all regions, but is mostly comprised of NA, OCE, and the EU regions.
---
We offer Looking for Group channels for the NA/EU/OCE players, and several voice channels for anyone to utilize. Tags are given so everyone can be distinguished by their server(s) to facilitate finding groups. Wuks (Arbiter, admin) has recently added a bot for various commands and a music channel as well!
---
The Community Chat Discord boasts the presence of 6 Rioters and 32 Volunteer program members. Since it's run by the knowledgeable and experienced members of Volunteer programs (such as the Arbiters and Emissaries) this Discord is also a great place to reach out for information and tips, as we're always happy to help. Or you can just hang out with us!
---
Our rules align closely with League's [Summoner's Code](http://gameinfo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/get-started/summoners-code/) so that all players can enjoy their stay.

Feel free to stop by,
DTN

https://i.gyazo.com/4b1175eedc36388144f326a36b04826a.png

Link: https://discord.me/lolchat
